WorkItem.Description:
Is there any difference between melee hit and physical hit on Rawr module? 
 
If Rawr defines melee hit is only white damage swing, and physical hit is every physical attack (melee and skill) the Bryntroll's proc condition has to be changed. not 15% on melee hit, but 15% on physical hit. 
 
Since the last hidden patch (on jan 8), no one mentioned it so I am doing. :)

Comments.Message: Melee hit is any melee, we use PhysicalHit so Hunter's Ranged attacks an also be used to proc something, versus an item that only procs on melee
Melee hit is any melee? Then, what about auto-attack swing? Because, I don't see any trigger on Rawr which stands for just auto-attack swing only except melee hit.
We don't have one as there hasn't been a proc that requires it, unless you can list some
